description:
The compulsory module for second year students focuses on the practical application of relevant knowledge and skills previously acquired in The Profession of Music 1 & 2 whilst forging collaboration and resourcefulness through groupwork.

The year-long module requires students to craft their own small-scale projects and execute them outside of YST through different themes: Hatching Ideas, Creating Impact, Workshop Skills, Ideas into Action, Mentorship and Project Execution. Depending on their interest areas, these projects can be performance or education focused.
title: Leading and Guiding Through Music
prerequisite: MUA1167 The Profession of Music 2 or a successful interview
